mapper.select: select distinct datas.${tai} as attr1,datas.${tana} as attr2,DENSE_RANK() over(order by ${tai}) taiCd,DENSE_RANK() over(PARTITION by ${tai} order by ${tai}, ${tana}) tanaCd from priority.work_priority_order_result_data datas where rank_upd != 99999999 and priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd} order by taiCd,tanaCd
select count(1) from priority.work_priority_order_attribute_classify where company_cd = #{companyCd} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd}
select tai_cd ,tana_cd,attr1,attr2 from priority.work_priority_order_attribute_classify where company_cd = #{companyCd} and priority_order_cd = #{priorityOrderCd} order by tai_cd,tana_cd
select distinct concat(tai_cd,'_', tana_cd) from priority.work_priority_order_attribute_classify where company_cd=#{companyCd} and priority_order_cd=#{priorityOrderCd}
